devdoc.details: Implements delegation of calls to other contracts, with proper forwarding of return values and bubbling of failures. It defines a fallback function that delegates all calls to the address returned by the abstract _implementation() internal function. * Credit: https://github.com/OpenZeppelin/openzeppelin-sdk/blob/master/packages/lib/contracts/upgradeability/Proxy.sol
devdoc.title: Proxy
